short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your background with a beautiful Galaxy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your workspace into a part of the cosmos with Custom Galaxy Background. This extension offers customizable wallpapers featuring dazzling galaxy scenes, from nebula clouds to mysterious star clusters. Every time you open a new tab, you'll be immersed in the beauty of distant galaxies, adding a sense of wonder and sparking your imagination. Create a unique and inspiring workspace right on your screen.
